author: Frank Rich
title: Frank Rich: John Roberts’s Wisconsin Shame
description: The Chief Justice’s latest assault on minority voting rights does not bode well for November.
content:
Most weeks, New York Magazine writer-at-large Frank Rich speaks with contributor Alex Carp about the biggest stories in politics and culture. Today, the Republican crusade against voting by mail, and what Bernie Sanderss exit means for the Democratic party.
… [+8453 chars]
